title: skin Mordekaiser Game of Thrones
body:
Hi, I thought this concept watching last episode of GoT (7x06), a skin for Mordekaiser based upon White Walkers:
He is a mystical existence who can control dead enemy (ultimate) and SPOILER 

[spoiler]he can control dead dragons[/spoiler]

the name of the skin could be something like "Mordekaiser white reverant" (=white walker) or "Mordekaiser king of the dead" (=King of Night)
sorry for bad english and tell me what u think guys, I really hope that some rioter read this message
